mapper.sql: requestId, adminId, beginTime, endTime, finishTime, requestReason, teacherId, applystatus, timestamp, totalPersonNum
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from finishedapplyment
order by ${orderByClause}

select finishedapplyment.requestId,finishedapplyment.adminId,finishedapplyment.finishTime,finishedapplyment.teacherId,finishedapplyment.applystatus, admin.adminId,admin.`name`,admin.eassyId,admin.departmentId,teacher.teacherId,teacher.teachername,essay.essayname,essay.essaysrc from finishedapplyment,teacher,admin,essay where datediff(finishedapplyment.finishTime, #{0,jdbcType=DATE})>=0 and datediff(#{1,jdbcType=DATE},finishedapplyment.finishTime)>=0 AND finishedapplyment.adminId=admin.adminId AND finishedapplyment.teacherId=teacher.teacherId AND admin.eassyId=essay.essayId ORDER BY finishedapplyment.beginTime
mapper.insert: insert into finishedapplyment (requestId, adminId, beginTime, endTime, finishTime, requestReason, teacherId, applystatus, timestamp, totalPersonNum) values (#{requestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{requestreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalpersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into finishedapplyment
requestId,
adminId,
beginTime,
endTime,
finishTime,
requestReason,
teacherId,
applystatus,
timestamp,
totalPersonNum,

mapper.update:
update finishedapplyment
requestId = #{record.requestid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
adminId = #{record.adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginTime = #{record.begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finishTime = #{record.finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
requestReason = #{record.requestreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacherId = #{record.teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applystatus = #{record.applystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
timestamp = #{record.timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
totalPersonNum = #{record.totalpersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update finishedapplyment set requestId = #{record.requestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adminId = #{record.adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beginTime = #{record.begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finishTime = #{record.finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, requestReason = #{record.requestreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacherId = #{record.teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applystatus = #{record.applystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, timestamp = #{record.timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, totalPersonNum = #{record.totalpersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update finishedapplyment
adminId = #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finishTime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
requestReason = #{requestreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacherId = #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applystatus = #{applystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
totalPersonNum = #{totalpersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where requestId = #{requestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update finishedapplyment set adminId = #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finishTime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, requestReason = #{requestreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacherId = #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applystatus = #{applystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, totalPersonNum = #{totalpersonnum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where requestId = #{requestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
